## Inviter.cancel() method

Cancels the INVITE request.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
cancel(options?: InviterCancelOptions): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | <code>InviterCancelOptions</code> | Options bucket. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`
